description:
WE ARE

We are Black Rifle Coffee Company, a veteran-owned company serving premium coffee to people who love America. We have a passion for coffee, the veteran community, dogs, the outdoors... in short, if it makes our country awesome, then we love it. Our customers always come first, because without them we would have nothing. They have our eternal gratitude for that. We sell awesome coffee and make goofy videos, but the beating heart of Black Rifle Coffee is really in giving back â€” it's about serving those who serve us. That means supporting the military, veteran, and first responder communities in the ways we know best. As far as the folks who work here, we value integrity, innovation, radical transparency, a crazy good work ethic, and a deep love for our country and each other.

THE ROLE

Responsible for the reporting, planning, analysis, and forecasting of BRCC.com assortments. Responsibilities include the financial planning of the categories, online site merchandising, managing product lifecycle, as well as forecasting.

YOUR TASK

Create, run, and maintain daily and monthly reports monitoring sales, margin, conversion, and other key performance indicators for product sales
Assist the Site Managers to establish key performance indicators and analysis of on-demand data to improve site conversion and sales
Analyze promotions and pricing for impact on assigned categories, provide feedback and recommendations for future execution
Contribute to hindsight reviews by gathering and analyzing sales and site performance metrics relevant to holiday and peak selling periods
Create sales and margin plans by day, month, quarter, season, and fiscal year
Provide sales and margin forecasts by week, month, and quarter based on history, rolling trends and assortment expansion/contraction
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, Marketing/Merchandising/Site Management in order to optimize sales and margin
Work with E-Commerce Merchants to report on product performance and merchandising initiatives
Utilize all available tools and reports to analyze assortment performance down to the item level
Work with Ecomm Operations and Ecomm Merchants to ensure target in-stock levels are maintained at the Sku level, particularly on high demand and highly advertised items
Examine SKU level sales performance and advise E-Commerce Merchants on margin growth, sale, markdown, and price-point opportunities
Assist E-Commerce Merchants with product lifecycle planning and analysis to include discontinued items, clearance, and liquidation strategies
Assist with identifying and pricing key items for high velocity selling periods by providing relevant sales data and analysis to optimize margin
YOUR EXPERIENCE

Minimum 5 + years of experience in corporate retail, planning, buying, sourcing, or procurement
Minimum of 2 + years of experience in E-Commerce, online sales, internet marketing, or related internet business
Excellent analytical skills with a strong command of retail math, margin management, inventory management, and ROI analysis strong organizational, time management, and multi-tasking skills
Proficient in Excel (advanced level),
Strong interpersonal, communication, and presentation skills
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
YOUR BENEFITS

Please note that only Full Time, W2 Employees are eligible for Black Rifle Coffee Benefits
Comprehensive medical, dental & vision package
401k with company match
Company-paid life insurance + supplemental options
Short and Long-Term disability options/coverage
Extensive EAP program with legal coverage
Pro-deal discounts with corporate partners in outdoor equipment, clothing, etc
American values-based culture built on freedom, integrity, accountability, respect, love, and commitment to serve those who have served


BRCC is an equal opportunity employer. Applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, sex, race, color, religion, national origin, genetics, disability, marital status, sexual orientation, veteran status or any other protected characteristic required by applicable law. All selected candidates will be required to submit to a pre-employment background check.
